name: Moments Before Disaster!
description:
“Moments Before Disaster!” is a action packed experience where you have to survive many different disaster scenarios such as.

  • Defusing a bomb in the middle of a highway
  • Zombie apocalypse
  • Nuclear explosion
  • Collapsing Dam
  • Tornado
    And many many more!
    You can play split screen couch co-op with your friends and tackle the disasters together just simply plug in a controller! 

Also includes bonus arcade games!
Made on the unreal engine 4
